description:
The Nadesico finds itself in trouble when they are given a mission to take out a new Jovian weapon called a "Walking Stick". After the weapon`s initial offensive critically damages the Nadesico`s systems, it`s up to the Aestivalis pilots to reach the deadly weapon and destroy it before it can recharge for a second barrage. But if the pilots can figure out the true meaning of teamwork soon, it might spell the end for the Nadesico.
Source: crunchyroll
